name: catachresis
text: The ladies love to talk about how they let their family down. It is ideal.

name: pzukowski
text: Congrats, your comment negates the need for any further comment. (except this)

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I know HTML and I let my family down.

name: relaxing
text: Sorry mom, sorry dad, sorry college

name: saint
text:
... and you let your family down?

you have ground to regain, friend.

name: chaesar
text: P.S. Call me old-fashioned, but I don't cry on the first date.

name: apocowarg
text: Call me old-fashioned but I only cry during sex.

name: audhumla
text: Lordy, that last panel is something fierce

name: mercuri0us
text: That last panel is some hell of rough chuckles, at least to anyone who knows only HTML.

name: m3funkyb
text: scoliosis

name: zoe
text: That last panel is basically a thing

name: quarantine
text: YES

name: cailetshadow
text: Ray and the five-year-old think exactly alike.

name: mystkmanat
text: The five-year-old is to be referred to by name at all times (Philippe)

name: laikalost
text: I've got a circle of webdesigner friends who would crap themselves with excitement upon reading this comic.  I must show it to them.

name: mattylite
text: Then take them to the pants store.

name: tekende
text: Or better yet, the toilet store.

name: mattylite
text: Where did you get those clothes, at the ... toilet store?

name: geysershitdick
text: Beef would like a girl who prefers compiled languages.

name: unsentletter
text: Showin' the brutal side of Roast Beef...

name: d-pad
text: As a programmer, I can attest to feeling the same way.

name: dasuta
text: Yeow, beef.  That is harsh, bro.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Well, he IS a kinky dogg.

name: aliiis
text:
I am a lady and I only know HTML and this strip makes me cry a tiny bit.

also, I would totally reply to this ad. but not as enthusiastically as to Philippe's one of two strips ago.

name: u235
text:
Is that a martini or a margarita in Ray's hand?

(Before you answer, remember that Ray is visiting a friend in Hospital.)

name: mercuri0us
text: How can Ray read his mind????

name: ketelcat
text: I don't even know HTML. Is that better or worse?

name: benthecartoon
text: Why, yes, I do use Dreamweaver!

name: random_shorts
text:
...let your family down, by failing to learn proper programming language?

Beef is interested in new ideas.

name: jackerouac
text: How has this alt text not been discussed more? Is so good.

name: kalethan
text: whenever the alt text voice continues the character's' filler patterns (such as 'uh') and avoids even the basickest punctuation, then it is funny
